articles.author: Arika Herron
articles.title: Indiana lawmakers defy Trump, won't join redistricting war - Axios
articles.description: Senate leadership announced Friday they wouldn't move forward with a planned session.
articles.content: Driving the news: Despite the national pressure and call from Gov. Mike Braun to hold a special session to pass a new map, the Republican supermajority doesn't have the votes, Senate President Pro Te… [+1945 chars]
